participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and empathetic, with a strong desire to help others and explore new experiences.
participant_1.background: I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park. I'm interested in trying new things and expanding my horizons. My favorite band is The Avett Brothers. I am 6 foot tall. I am still a student, but I am going to be a nurse.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Reserved and introspective, focused on personal growth and creativity through filmmaking.
participant_2.background: I do not like to talk about my personal life. I need to find a way to lose weight that fits with my beliefs and lifestyle. I'm going back to school. I work out in my home gym to keep fit. I like to make short films.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I am a film maker and I am going back to school to study film.
Oh cool! What kind of films do you make?
I like to make short films. I am trying to get into directing.
That is awesome. I am working as a nurse. I am still in school but I am going to be a nurse.
Oh cool! I have a friend who is a nurse. What is it like?
It is challenging but it is very rewarding. I like helping people.
I am glad that you like it. I want to do something that is challenging and rewarding.
Oh cool! Do you have any ideas what you want to do?
I am not sure yet. I am still trying to figure it out.
Oh okay. I am sure you will figure it out. I am here for you if you need any help.
